content.text:
# 2024 Pennsylvania Republican presidential primary

Trump
| image1 = Official Presidential Portrait of President Donald J. Trump (2025).jpg
| candidate1 = Donald Trump
| color1 = 283681
| home_state1 = Florida
| popular_vote1 = 794,048
| percentage1 = 83.35%
| delegate_count1 = 67
| image2 = Nikki Haley (53299447738) (cropped).jpg
| candidate2 = Nikki Haley  (withdrawn)
| color2 = FE6100
| home_state2 = South Carolina
| popular_vote2 = 158,672
| percentage2 = 16.65%
| delegate_count2 = 0
}}
The 2024 Pennsylvania Republican presidential primary was held on April 23, 2024, as part of the Republican Party primaries for the 2024 presidential election. 67 delegates to the 2024 Republican National Convention were allocated.
Endorsements
*Tom Marino, PA-12 (2019) and PA-10 (2011–2019)
*Keith Rothfus, PA-12 (2013–2019)
State senators
*Greg Rothman, 34th district (2023-present); state representative for the 87th district (2015-2022)
}}
}}
}}
*David McCormick, Under Secretary of the Treasury for International Affairs (2007–2009), Deputy National Security Advisor for International Economic Affairs (2006–2007), and Under Secretary of Commerce for Industry and Security (2005–2006) (previously declined to endorse)
*Carla Sands, U.S. Ambassador to Denmark (2017–2021)
Statewide officials
*Stacy Garrity, Pennsylvania State Treasurer (2021-present)
U.S. Representatives
*John Joyce, PA-13 (2019–present)
*Fred Keller, PA-12 (2019–2023)
*Mike Kelly, PA-16 (2019–present) and PA-03 (2011–2019)
*Dan Meuser, PA-09 (2019–present)
*Scott Perry, PA-10 (2019–present) and PA-04 (2013–2019) and Chair of the House Freedom Caucus (2022–2024)
*Glenn Thompson, PA-15 (2019–present) and PA-05 (2009–2019)
*Guy Reschenthaler, PA-14 (2019–present)
*Lloyd Smucker, PA-11 (2019–present) and PA-16 (2017–2019)
State representatives
*Mike Cabell, 117th district (2023–2024)
*Ryan Mackenzie, 134th (2012-2022), 187th district (2023-2024)
}}
